products.title: Voile White Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile range of fabrics create a natural feature of the rooms natural light, and are fantatic at creating some privacy without sacrificing light. This soft cotton white coloured screen fabric, in its uplifitng shade and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this white blind is not only made by their expert team in the heart of yorkshire, but comes with customer-first service and guarantees.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Marlow Blackout Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Marlow blackout is a sophisticatd basketweave fabric. It has a blackout feature that gives you complete control over the light coming into your room. This attractive blackout roller blind in a cotton white colour will brighten any window dressing. Product id: sdb-rbx2280 fabric colour: cotton white material: 100% polyester lining: white blackout backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes marlow blackout cotton white roller blind in white.

products.title: Empathy Blackout Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Just so perfectly simple. This roller blind is pristine white with a structured weave that creates a minimalist look. Wonderful for adding texture, freshness and signature style to your space. A perfect choice for any sophisticated room and thanks to the blackout finish just so perfectly simple.
